item.description:
The Canine Good Citizen Certification is a nationally recognized award through the American Kennel Club; (for more information on "What is the CGC?" visit http://www.akc.org/events/cgc/program.cfm.) It is a PASS/"UN-PASS" (I hate to use the F word for this... it just means "More Training!" :) 10-step evaluation, covering things like sit, down, stay, come, loose-leash walking, manners around other dogs, and supervised separation; (for more information on EXACTLY what the 10 steps are visit http://www.akc.org/events/cgc/training_testing.cfm.)

If you have done some training with your dog (bully breed or not!), or attended some of our social events, you already have a great start! If you need to get started, consider dropping in on Thursday nights! (See http://www.meetup.com/new-england-bully-breed-club/events/69382032/ for more information.)

If you have specific questions regarding this test, please feel free to email me direct at justcassie101@gmail.com.

The cost for taking this test is $15. Please familiarize yourself with the program by visiting http://www.akc.org/events/cgc/, so there are no surprises (i.e. there are no treats allowed, no harnesses or metal collars, etc.). Give it a try!

Looking forward to CGC'ing your dog!
Cassie-Leigh Stock
President & Founder
NEBBC

P.S. If you are a CGC evaluator and would like to volunteer your services, please contact me direct at justcassie101@gmail.com or call me at (774) 327-4669.
item.name: Canine Good Citizen Testing! C'mon & give it a shot!
